attributes.action: Use Category 3 Laboratories in UK Universities to process Covid Antigen tests.
attributes.background:
At the beginning of the Covid Pandemic, Universities throughout the UK were prepared to make their Category 3 containment Laboratories and staff available for Covid Antigen Testing. 

With the demand for tests outstripping the ability to process them, now is the time to make use of them.

rejection.details:
The Government is still advertising for help to provide laboratory capacity, and the Government's guidance on which laboratories can provide part of the testing pathway already refers to Category 3 facilities.

Guidance on helping the government increase coronavirus (COVID-19) testing capacity: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/help-the-government-increase-coronavirus-covid-19-testing-capacity

Guidance for organisations seeking to support the COVID 19 Testing Programme: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/879385/Guidance_for_Laboratories_offering_support_for_COVID-19_testing_for_publication_v2__2_.pdf

Deciding whether to offer support to the Government's testing programme is a matter for individual universities.
